specials.name: Greek salad
specials.description: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

specials.name: Bruchetta
specials.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.

specials.name: Lemon Dessert
specials.description: This comes straight from grandma's recipe book, every last ingredient has been sourced and is as authentic as can be imagined.

drinks.name: Mediterranean Lemonade
drinks.description: Freshly squeezed lemonade with a hint of rose water.

drinks.name: Turkish Coffee
drinks.description: Strong, rich coffee brewed in the traditional Turkish style.

drinks.name: Mint Tea
drinks.description: A refreshing herbal tea made with fresh mint leaves.

drinks.name: Pomegranate Juice
drinks.description: Sweet and tart juice made from fresh pomegranates.

appetizers.name: Hummus
appetizers.description: A classic Mediterranean dip made with chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon juice. Served with pita bread.

appetizers.name: Baba Ghanoush
appetizers.description: Roasted eggplant dip with tahini, garlic, and lemon juice. Served with pita bread.

appetizers.name: Falafel
appetizers.description: Crispy chickpea fritters, served with tahini sauce and a side salad.

appetizers.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
appetizers.description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice, herbs, and spices, served with tzatziki sauce.

appetizers.name: Dolmades
appetizers.description: Stuffed grape leaves with rice, herbs, and spices. Served with tzatziki sauce.

salads.name: Tabbouleh
salads.description: A traditional Middle Eastern salad made with bulgur wheat, tomatoes, cucumbers, parsley, and mint.

salads.name: Fattoush
salads.description: A refreshing salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, and crispy pita chips.

salads.name: Mediterranean Salad
salads.description: Fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, olives, and feta cheese. Served with a side of Greek dressing.

entrees.name: Lamb Kebab
entrees.description: Grilled lamb skewers marinated in Mediterranean spices. Served with rice pilaf and grilled vegetables.

entrees.name: Chicken Shawarma
entrees.description: Thinly sliced marinated chicken, wrapped in pita bread with lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce. Served with a side of fries.

entrees.name: Beef Gyro
entrees.description: Thinly sliced marinated beef, wrapped in pita bread with lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce. Served with a side of fries.

entrees.name: Vegetarian Moussaka
entrees.description: A vegetarian twist on the classic Greek dish. Layers of eggplant, potatoes, and zucchini, topped with a creamy bechamel sauce.

entrees.name: Mediterranean Grilled Fish
entrees.description: Fresh fish marinated in Mediterranean spices and grilled to perfection. Served with a side of grilled vegetables.

entrees.name: Seafood Paella
entrees.description: A classic Spanish dish made with saffron rice, shrimp, mussels, clams, and calamari.

entrees.name: Mixed Grill
entrees.description: A hearty platter of grilled chicken, lamb, and beef, served with roasted vegetables and rice pilaf.

entrees.name: Mediterranean Stuffed Peppers
entrees.description: Red bell peppers stuffed with seasoned ground beef, rice, and herbs, served with a side salad.

entrees.name: Vegetarian Moussaka
entrees.description: A vegetarian twist on the classic Greek dish. Layers of eggplant, potatoes, and zucchini, topped with a creamy bechamel sauce.

entrees.name: Falafel Platter
entrees.description: Crispy chickpea fritters served with tahini sauce, rice pilaf, and grilled vegetables.

entrees.name: Shrimp Scampi
entrees.description: Succulent shrimp saut√©ed in garlic butter and white wine, served over linguine pasta.

desserts.name: Baklava
desserts.description: Sweet pastry made with layers of phyllo dough, honey, and nuts.

desserts.name: Galaktoboureko
desserts.description: Greek custard pie made withsemolina, phyllo dough, and a sweet syrup.

desserts.name: Kunefe
desserts.description: A traditional Middle Eastern dessert made with shredded phyllo dough, sweet cheese, and a drizzle of syrup.

desserts.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey
desserts.description: Creamy Greek yogurt drizzled with honey and topped with walnuts.
